article_title: Russia has no information about reported Russian deaths in ...
article_text:
MOSCOW, Oct 20 (Reuters) - The Russian embassy in Damascus said on Tuesday it had no information about reports that three Russians had been killed fighting alongside Syrian government forces.

"There is no information about the alleged 'deaths of three Russians' or 'three Russian servicemen' in Syria, as reported by Reuters," RIA news agency quoted the embassy as saying.

(Reporting by Alexander Winning, Writing by Jack Stubbs; Editing by Angus MacSwan)

article_metadata.description: MIDEAST-CRISIS/SYRIA-RUSSIA-CASUALTIES (URGENT):Russia has no information about reported Russian deaths in Syria -RIA cites embassy
article_metadata.author: Thomson Reuters Foundation
